title: Regniard (J.)
body: In 1895, a 47-VII page pamphlet entitled No Laboratório. Psychologia e Pathologia Cerebral was published in this city, which caused a great sensation among us, signed under the pseudonym J. Regniard, with its author still unknown to many.

J. Regniard: Author of the pamphlet 'No Laboratório. Psychologia e Pathologia Cerebral'

1895: Publication of the pamphlet 'No Laboratório. Psychologia e Pathologia Cerebral'
